titleStmt.title: Princeton Ethiopic Manuscript No. 39: Mystigogia (Təməhrətä Həbu'at), Prayer of the Covenant (Sälotä Kidan), and Rampart of the Cross (Hasurä Mäskäl)

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

msIdentifier.idno: Princeton Ethiopic Manuscript No. 39: Mystigogia (Təməhrətä Həbu'at), Prayer of the Covenant (Sälotä Kidan), and Rampart of the Cross (Hasurä Mäskäl)

summary.p: Fol. 18r: The original owner's name was left blank and, in crude hand, the name Gäbrä Maryam inserted.

References: See references listed in manuscript no. 13 Regarding Rampart of the Cross, see Sylvain Grébaut, "Petit (a(oura Masqal." Aethiops, 6me année, no. 1 (1938) 12–13. Strelcyn, British Library, 76; Encyclopedia Aethiopica, vol. 2, pp. 1045.

msItem.title: Prayer for the Covenant, Sälotä Kidan
Prayer Called Rampart of the Cross, Hasurä Mäskäl (Strelcyn 76.3)
Magical Prayer Undoing Charms, Hasurä Mäsqäl
